short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension that can check the price of Cryptocurrency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Check the Cryptocurrency Price.
    - Using poloniex API.
- select the currency to display.

Currency:
- BTC
- ETH
- ETC
- XMR
- REP
- XRP
- ZEC
- LTC
- DASH
